title: Studio 99
description: A professional recording studio offering state-of-the-art equipment and acoustics.

title: Theater Rotterdam
description: A major theatre complex hosting a wide range of performances including drama, dance, and music.

title: Boijmans Van Beuningen Museum
description: An art museum showcasing a vast collection of artworks from different eras.

title: Rotterdam Art Studio
description: A vibrant studio space for local artists to create and exhibit their work.

title: Kunsthal Rotterdam
description: A cultural institution presenting temporary exhibitions of modern and contemporary art.

title: WORM Rotterdam
description: An experimental venue for avant-garde music, film, and performance art.

title: Maassilo
description: A former grain silo now converted into a music and event venue with multiple stages.

title: Theater Walhalla
description: A small, intimate theatre offering a variety of performances and shows.

title: Rotterdam Philharmonic Orchestra
description: The home of the city's renowned philharmonic orchestra.

title: LP2 Exhibition Space
description: A modern exhibition space hosting contemporary art shows and events.

title: V2_Lab for the Unstable Media
description: An interdisciplinary center for art and media technology.

title: Galerie Atelier Herenplaats
description: A gallery and studio for artists with intellectual disabilities.

title: De Doelen
description: A concert hall and convention center in Rotterdam.

title: TENT Rotterdam
description: A contemporary art center presenting exhibitions, events, and educational programs.
